name: POTIOMNESIA
description:
You're a very dumb old wizard who got drunk and made an unknown potion while wasted. You wake up and try to figure out what you did and how to prevent the apocalypse !

This is a puzzle game where you have to use your brain to understand which potion is cooking and be creative and smart about how to get ride of it safely.

After the best sellers on LudumDare: Menorah's Quest & Deep Sea

And the awarded : Nail'em

pepnou and enderswype are proud to present there very first 3D game POTIOMNESIA

Controls : 

W A S D space enter
